radar.title: Rēdā
radar.subtitle: Chikaku wo tansaku
radar.noDiscoveriesSubtext: Arukimawatte kakusa reta messēji wo mitsukeyō
radar.errorNoInternet: Intānetto setsuzoku ga arimasen. Onrain-ji ni kōshin shite kudasai.
radar.errorRateLimit: Rikuesuto ga ōsugimasu. Sukoshi omachi kudasai.
radar.errorRefresh: Kōshin ni shippai shimashita. Mō ichido otameshi kudasai.

drop.title: Messēji wo Doroppu
drop.subtitle: Tansōsha ga hakken suru nanika wo nokoshimashō
drop.placeholder: Koko ni nani wo nokoshitai desu ka?
drop.locationRequiredText: Ichi jōhō wo shutoku dekimasen. Ichi jōhō sābisu wo yūkō ni shite sai-shikō shite kudasai.
drop.successSubtext: Anata no ichi ni pin-domesare, hoka no hito ga hakken dekimasu
drop.errorText: Messēji wo nokosu sai ni erā ga hassei shimashita. Mō ichido otameshi kudasai.
drop.errorNoConnection:
192.168.1.32:8000 no sābā ni setsuzoku dekimasen.

Kakunin shite kudasai:
1. Keitai denwa ga konpyūtā to onaji WiFi ni setsuzoku sarete iru
2. Bakkuendo sābā ga jikkō-chū
3. Windows faiauōru ga pōto 8000 wo burokku shite inai
drop.errorRateLimit: Messēji wo sakusei suru sokudo ga hayasugimasu. Sukoshi matte kara sai-shikō shite kudasai.
drop.tapToGetLocation: Tappu shite ichi jōhō wo shutoku
drop.info: Messēji wa 72-jikan go ni kigen-gire • Ii ne de jumyō ga nobimasu

community.title: Komyuniti
community.subtitle: Oshirase
community.composeSubtitle: Zen yūzā ni hyōji sareru messēji wo tōkō

diary.title: Nikki
diary.subtitle: Anata no hakken no kiroku
diary.emptySubtext:
Hakken shita basho wo otozureru to
jidōteki ni kiroku saremasu
diary.deleteMessage: Kono nikki wo sakujo shimasu ka?
